set.name: DM24-SP1 Character Premium Deck: "I don't wanna be a Dragon Girl!" Yeah! Utterly, Wholly, Dragon!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Jurassic Command Dragon/Revolutionary/Team Damama

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Light or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent's creatures that cost less than the number of cards in your mana zone are put tapped. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, put all creatures that have power less than this creature into their owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Legend Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP1 Character Premium Deck: "I don't wanna be a Dragon Girl!" Yeah! Utterly, Wholly, Dragon!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Mega Command Dragon/Revolutionary/Team Hamukatsu

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Fire or Nature Dragon that costs 5 or more {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your multicolored creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, put any number of non-evolution multicolored creatures that have total cost 6 or lessfrom your hand or mana zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Legend Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SP1 Character Premium Deck: "I don't wanna be a Dragon Girl!" Yeah! Utterly, Wholly, Dragon!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Armored Dragon/Earth Dragon/Forbidden

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add up to 2 cards from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may destroy all creatures that have power 6000 or less. ■ At the end of your turn, if 4 or more creatures were destroyed this turn, take an extra turn after this one.

property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Rules
property.value: {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever you put a dragon, draw up to 5 cards. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells that cost less than the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand. TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from a player's graveyard. That player shuffles those cards into their deck.

property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from a player's graveyard. That player shuffles those cards into their deck.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped, then return a Dragon creature from your mana zone to your hand. Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than that Dragon and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature or when this creature is discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's cards, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a Dragon from among it and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a Dragon, after you cast, add this spell to your hand instead of your graveyard.
